comments.body: I feel like I'm missing something obvious, but is `index` optional or not?
Hi casey, can you please refer previous comments. You may get the idea of why i did it.
I'm assuming you're referring to this comment: https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/35994#discussion_r291305510.  I saw it, but didn't follow - could you possibly paraphrase?
